subject: Photography
title: Why Landscape Photography Endures
description: One-minute skill: Why Landscape Photography Endures.

hook.text: Landscape photography is the oldest genre and still the most popular. Nature never stops being photogenic.

buildup.text: Since Ansel Adams, photographers have chased mountains, coastlines, deserts, and forests for the perfect shot.

discovery.text: Landscape photography connects people to places they may never visit. It's travel for the eyes.

twist.text: The genre is deceptively hard. Weather, timing, and patience matter more than gear or location alone.

climax.text: The best landscapes don't just record scenery ‚Äî they evoke the feeling of being there.

punchline.text: A landscape photo is a place you can visit with your eyes.

quiz.question: What makes landscape photography deceptively difficult?
options: Weather, timing, and patience matter more than equipment
It requires the most expensive cameras
Landscapes are always easy to photograph
